item.description:
PRE-REGISTRATION ONLY!
FREE SHUTTLE FROM BACK BAY SHERATON! (5:45 AM)
More info & registration: http://racemenu.com/a...


The Younger Chemists Committee of the American Chemical Society presents the 8th Annual YCC Fun Run. This race is in support of the ACS Scholars Program, which helps underrepresented minority students to pursue undergraduate degrees and careers in the chemical and engineering sciences.

There will be registration and pick-up on Sunday August 22nd from 1-5 PM at the Boston Conference and Exibition Center. Event will be pre-registration ...only and on-line registration will be available until 8:00 PM Sunday August 22. Check-in will be available day of race. Please visit http://www.racemenu.c... to register for event.

Scenic, oceanside course (view map here) around Pleasure Bay and Castle Island's Fort Independence.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: 8th Annual YCC Fun Run 5K
